==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Kaiulani is an {{Ancient Name|bearer=1}} [[Ancient Name]] bearer and a renowned warrior of the [[People of the Springs]]. She is one of [[Atea]]'s "hot spring buddies", having been one of the guests at her parties, and apparently around the same generation as Atea and [[Liliuo]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Home of the Hot Springs}}</ref>

At the time that the Traveler arrived in Natlan, Kaiulani had not achieved victory in the [[Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame]] for the previous ten years, but got top rankings that year and was sent to fight in the [[Night Warden Wars]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Quest)}}</ref>

===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
Kaiulani has the appearance of a [[Flowing Blade Skirmisher]]. She also wears a sunglasses and has a blue guitar on her back.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{w|Kaʻiulani}} was a Hawaiian royal, the only child of Princess {{w|Likelike}} and the last {{w|heir apparent}} to the throne of the {{w|Hawaiian Kingdom}}.
